definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: plant (NH id., and deriv.; cf. Sab. [[נטעת]] pavilion [? as planted, established] DHM:ZMG xxxvii.(1883), 337, 349):—

plant, c. acc. of tree or vine Nu 24:6 (JE; subj. ´[[י]]), Ge 21:33 (J), Le 19:23 (H), Is 44:14, Ps 106:16 (subj. ´[[י]]), Ec 2:5 also (fig. of people) Je 2:21, Je 11:17, Ps 80:9, Ps 80:16; c. acc. of vineyard Ge 9:20 (J), Am 5:11, Am 9:14, 2Ki 19:29 = Is 37:30, Zep 1:13, De 20:6, De 28:30, De 28:39, Je 31:5, Je 31:5, Je 31:5, Je 35:7, Ez Eze 28:26, Is 65:21, Pr 31:16, Ps 107:37, Ec 2:4; olive trees and vineyards De 6:11, Jos 24:13 (D); garden Ge 2:8 (´[[י]]), Je 29:5, Je 29:28; so c. acc. [[אֲשֵׁרַָה כָּל־עֵץ]] De 16:21; [[נִטְעֵי]] ´[[נ]] [[נַעֲמָנִים]] Is 17:10 (fig. of idolatry); abs. (lit.) Is 65:22, Ec 3:2, Ec 3:2 (opp. [[עָקַר]]); c. 2 acc. Is 5:2 (plant vineyard with wine).

plant, fig. = establish, usu. of establishing people, c. acc. 2Sa 17:10 = 1Ch 17:9, Am 9:15 (opp. [[נׇתַשׁ]]), Ez Eze 36:36, Ex 15:17 (song), esp. Je 24:6, Je 32:41 ([[ב]] loc.), Je 42:10 (opp. [[נׇתַשׁ]]), 45:10 (opp. id.), Ps 44:3 (all of establishing Isr.); of establishing wicked Je 12:2; abs. of establishing people Je 1:10, Je 18:9, Je 31:28; more lit., establish heavens Is 51:16 (‖[[לִיסׂד אֶרֶץ]]); plant i.e. fix (late use) tents Da 11:45; [[מַשְׂמְרוֹת נְטוּעִים]] Ec 12:11 nails planted, i.e. fixed in; even [[אׂ זֶן]] ´[[נ]] Ps 94:9 he that, planted, the ear.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[נִטָָּעוּ]] Is 40:24 be planted, fig., = be established.
